name: Smeargle
flavorText:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

previous.name: Stantler
previous.flavorText:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

next.name: Tyrogue
next.flavorText:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
